attributes.action: ensure that spectrum freed for use following digital switchover is available for citizen and community uses, by rejecting the notion that all of it is sold off to the highest bidder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BEWARE ALL!!!

It is not Ofcom that will or will not do anything to determine usage of spectrum, it is the government that will decide whether or not to accept Ofcom's recommendation that there be an auction (or many auctions), so we need to petition the government to ensure that spectrum freed by DSO is available for community and citizen purposes.

~Rebecca Fulton, for and on behalf of Public Voice.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ensure that spectrum freed for use following digital switchover is available for citizen and community uses, by rejecting the notion that all of it is sold off to the highest bidder."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11398.asp
